entry.title: Backward deterministic R Value
entry.summary: The conversation thread starts with one person acknowledging confusion about the use of R values in the context of bipayment channels without HTLCs. Nicolas Dorier responds, admitting to a lack of deep knowledge about Lightning technology and explaining his mental model. Mats Jerratsch clarifies his point, stating that Alice could accept other payments but not disclose R for a particular one. The thread ends with Mats Jerratsch's contact information and PGP key.
